ingredientsDesc: teicoplanin, contains not less than 80% of teicoplanin A2 group (A2-1,A2-2,A2-3,A2-4,A2-5), contains not less than 15% of teicoplanin A3-1, and contains not less than 900ug(potency)per mg, calculated on the anhydrous, de-sodium chloride and de-residual solvents basis. The potency of Teicoplanin is expresses as mass(potency) of teicoplanin (C72-89H68-99C12N8-9O28-33).
applicantAddr: 台北市中山區中山北路三段３０號１１樓之１
